function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate control of air-conditioning and ventilation systems","Impact":"Increased risk of SARS-CoV-2 transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing better control measures and strategies for air-conditioning and ventilation systems","Technologies":"Air cleaners, humidifiers, improved ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, public","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of scientific certainty in evaluating indoor environmental quality control","Impact":"Uncertainty in the effectiveness of precautionary measures","Mitigation":"Conducting further research and evaluation to assess the effect of indoor environmental quality control","Technologies":"Research studies, scientific evaluation methods","People":"Public, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities"}]}
